Welcome, 
MobiTexter is a Messenger & SMS Texting app 
Text from your laptop, mobile and any Android device using your own phone number. 
Send and receive text on the laptop/pc/computer browser from http://www.mobitexter.net/ 
For any queries, get in touch with us at support@mobitexter.net
You don\'t have any network access now
